lyrics.text:
Ko homau ‘Otua
‘A e ‘Afiona,
Ko e ‘Eiki anga’ofa
Ki homau fa’ahinga.

Ko e unga’anga
Ki he āfangia,
Pea mo e hao’anga
Ki he halaia.

Ko Ho ta’ata’a
Mo Ho Laumālie
Ko e ma’a’anga ia
Ki he kakai hia.

’E fiemālie
‘A e laumālie
‘O e kakai ‘oku tui
Ki he ‘Afiona.

Sīsū ‘alo’ofa
Ki Ho kakai vaivai,
‘I he’enau kei fononga
Ki he maama lelei.
